title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your emotional sensitivity balances wonderfully with your rational and analytical side today. Youre operating more with your whole brain rather than allowing one side to dominate the internal conversation. Share whatever is in your heart in an appropriate manner. Follow up on any projects and recent decisions waiting for your green light. You only need to rely on the facts and trust your judgment. Politician Arthur Alfred Lynch wrote, Intuition without reason is the fertile mother of blunder and wrongs. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
